wikipedia_page.main: Henry Page Croft, 1st Baron Croft  (22 June 1881 – 7 December 1947) was a decorated British soldier and Conservative Party politician.

response: ** Henry Page Croft, 1st Baron Croft, British politician (b. 1881)
* Henry Page Croft, 1st Baron Croft   (1881–1947), Conservative politician

They had four children: Thomas Elmsley Croft, who succeeded his father as 7th Baronet; Archer Denman Croft, who succeeded his brother as 8th Baronet; Frances Elizabeth Croft; and the Reverend Richard Croft, rector at Hillingdon, Middlesex, England. Croft's great-grandson was Henry Page Croft, 1st Baron Croft (he being the son of Richard Benyon Croft, J.P., D.L., High Sheriff of Hertfordshire in 1892, of Fanhams Hall, Ware, Hertfordshire, and grandson of Reverend Richard Croft).Burke's Peerage, Baronetage and Knightage 2003, vol. 2, p. 2839
